description: Sharp's SMD2470AS 24 In. Flat Panel Microwave Drawer, in stainless steel, is the ideal replacement for conventional countertop or over-the-range microwaves. This 1.2 cu. ft. microwave drawer takes the microwave off the counter and places it at a convenient height, making use of the microwave easier for virtually every cook in the family. It offers flexibility and allows you to "hide" the microwave while providing superb accessibility. Featuring 1000 watts of power and plenty of cooking options for a variety of recipes, this microwave is the perfect addition to any family kitchen. With a more integrated flat panel design, hidden control panel, plus AutoTouch drawer opening system, the SMD2470AS really is the best solution for where to place the microwave.

The Frigidaire FFMV162LM 1.6 Cu. Ft. Over-The-Range Microwave, in silver mist, combines the impressive Fits-More capacity, which can hold anything up to a 9? x 13? baking dish, with various cooking options into a microwave that can handle most dishes. The Ready-Select controls make choosing from the multitude of settings incredibly easy. Plus, because this microwave was designed to be installed as an over-the-range unit, it comes equipped with a two-speed ventilation hood, which helps clear steam, smoke, and odors from the kitchen. The built-in extra-large 13.5? diameter glass turntable ensures that food is cooked perfectly evenly.
